knimeNode.name: Pie chart (interactive)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Displays data in an interactive pie chart with hiliting support.

intro.p: Displays an interactive pie chart with different viewing options. The interactive pie chart supports hiliting and the changing of the pie and aggregation column on the fly.
If the pie chart appears in gray no color information is set for the selected pie column. Use the 'Color Manager' node in order to set the color appropriate.

The user can change the following view properties on the fly:
Pie column
Aggregation column
Aggregation method (count, summary, average)
Pie size
Show missing value section
Show pie section outline
Draw selected section exploded
Show details for selected sections
Set value scale to percentage or original
Pie size
Explode size
Each pie column value get its own colored section. Hiliting is supported.

Color selected sections: If the color selected sections option is selected the pie displays also sub sections for the selected sections. A sub section represents the rows color using the color manager. This option is only available if row colors are set.

p.b: Please note: This node caches all data in the main memory to provide interactive functions. If you plan to visualize extremely large datasets the non interactive "Pie chart" node may be better suited.
The pie chart supports maximum 360 sections!

fullDescription.option: If selected the pie chart displays all rows of the incoming data.
Defines the number of rows to be displayed in the pie chart. This option is disabled if the 'Display all rows' option is selected.
The values of this column are represent as colored section in the pie chart. Can be changed in the view later on.
The initial aggregation method to use. Can be changed in the view later on.
The column to calculate the aggregation values from. Can be changed in the view later on.

ports.dataIn: The data table to be displayed.

views.view: Displays the data in an pie chart.
